<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Spy](/NPCs.aspx?ID=885)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

No empire would be complete without its spies. The spy is a master of infiltrating the court and blending in: they might be one of a number of nobles, a beloved confidante of the queen, or even the court jester. Spies use their skills to subtly manipulate courtiers, turn enemies against one another, and collect valuable information either for blackmail or to auction to the highest bidder.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/NPCs/Courtier_Spy.png" />
</column>

</row>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 207</row>

**Perception** +17

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Local Court Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +14, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +2

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Noble's Ally** The spy has positioned themself to seem a trusted ally, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49) or to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) among the nobles of that court.

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (4), [Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [fine clothes](/Equipment.aspx?ID=15), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [_+1 rapier_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 90

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_rapier_ +16 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 piercing

**Hidden Blade** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Effect** The spy draws a weapon and then Strikes with it. The target of the Strike is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against the attack.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The spy deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
